item.title: "It Was The Most Extreme Transformation Iâ€™ve Ever Done:" Thunderbolts* Star Lewis Pullman Addresses Getting Into Superhero Shape To Become The MCU's Sentry
item.description: Thunderbolts* actor Lewis Pullman opened up about how he achieved his superhero physique and what his cheat day foods post-filming included.

item.title: Godzilla x Kong 3's Title Has Me Convinced SpaceGodzilla Is Finally Joining The Monsterverse
item.description: The title of the latest chapter in the Monsterverse is Godzilla X Kong: Supernova, which leads me to believe that SpaceGodzilla is finally on his way.

item.title: Dolph Lundgren Fights Alien Gangsters In This 1990s Sci-Fi Movie You Need To See
item.description: Dolph Lundgren starred in several action movies over his career, but one sci-fi action film remains overlooked and deserves a much bigger audience.
